verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: When] [ARG0: President Trump] [V: tweets] [ARG1: his warnings about unchecked immigration and the need to build a wall] , he is tapping into fears on the right that extend beyond the economy and border security , and into our culture itself .

When President Trump tweets his warnings about unchecked immigration and the need to build a wall , he [V: is] tapping into fears on the right that extend beyond the economy and border security , and into our culture itself .
